attributes.review: this app is horrible!! i got the app to see our president and his opinions but instead i saw garfield in a tie. not only did that happen, this app stole all my information!! i entered my mobile number, then 8 different hackers got into my phone. the worst part about this was that garfield soon started appearing in my nightmares. last night, my sleep paralysis demon was trump. or garfield. i couldn’t tell. he was so ugly i couldn’t move. this app literally traumatized me. i don’t know how i’ll ever sleep again. it’s a no❤️ from me. 🥰😺😻😾🙀😿😹
attributes.title: ✨t r a s h✨

attributes.review: Is this for real? I seriously can’t tell if this app is a joke or not, because i’m over laughing. Dumbest thing i’ve ever downloaded and it keeps crashing my phone?? Not to mention awful compaigning, this is repulsive definitely less than a 1 star app, deserves 0.
attributes.title: Horrid

attributes.review: This app damnnnn near killed me. As soon as I opened it ALL my maf*cking windows shot open and people from outside starting throwing knives at me when I finally got a chance to look out the window they all bolted to their car that had a sign on it saying “WITH THE OFFICIAL TRUMP 2020 APP” so I just figured it was the app that made it all happen.
attributes.title: BREATH TAKINGLY DISGUSTING🤮🤢

attributes.review: when i opened the app there was a fat man running to the screen saying KILL ALL MEXICANS and i kinda felt offended by that but besides the point, this app glitched out my phone so much. i got a call from the app saying that if i don’t cut my left leg off they will execute me so now i only have one leg 🦵🏽😔
